greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: (1-x^2)/(1-x+x^4)
comment: The Kn11 sums, see A180662, of triangle A108299 equal the terms of this sequence.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,-1).
maple: A193884 := proc(n) option remember: if n=0 then 1 elif n=1 then 1 elif n=2 then 0 elif n=3 then 0 elif n>=4 then procname(n-1)-procname(n-4) fi: end: seq(A193884(n), n=0..54);
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 11 2011
